import styled from 'styled-components' const StyledFeature = styled.div` display: flex; width: 100%; ` const StyledFeatureBody = styled.div` background-color: gray; flex: ${props => props.size}; box-shadow: 0px 10px 15px -3px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); /*tailwindcss large shadow*/ ` const StyledFeatureImage = styled.div` background-color: ${props => props.theme.red};; flex: ${props => props.size}; ` export const LeftFeature = () => (

Internet entertainment. Global original content. Product personalization.

Our first original series debuted in 2013. Over the following decades, Internet TV will replace linear, and we hope to keep loading by offering an amazing entertainment experience.

hi
